topic.title: What brought me here = what keeps me here?
topic.body:
I stumbled upon this looking for a place to build a simple yet effective web presence to promote some projects being collaborated on. Online radio, exclusive events, artisan galleries and trade shows, eclectic support & training services, resource exchange..

Just a few items of agenda that seem might be serviced here. 

if nothing else, it's a great start and an intriguing environment. 

Thank you to the developers and supporters, the coders and the users, who make this possible.
